en.answer:
In both of these situations, since you already control a card named "Mirrorjade the Iceblade Dragon", you cannot Special Summon another Mirrorjade the Iceblade Dragon.

~~~

This also applies to the following monsters'『you can only control 1 "⁜⁜⁜"』effects: Grandmaster of the Six Samurai, Apollousa, Bow of the Goddess, Dakki, the Graceful Mayakashi, Tsukahagi, the Poisonous Mayakashi, Hajun, the Winged Mayakashi, Oboro-Guruma, the Wheeled Mayakashi, Tsuchigumo, the Poisonous Mayakashi, Yoko, the Graceful Mayakashi, Gashadokuro, the Skeletal Mayakashi, Yuki-Onna, the Ice Mayakashi, Yuki-Onna, the Absolute Zero Mayakashi, Yuki-Onna, the Icicle Mayakashi, Mardel, Generaider Boss of Light, Frodi, Generaider Boss of Swords, Dovelgus, Generaider Boss of Iron, Naglfar, Generaider Boss of Fire, Nidhogg, Generaider Boss of Ice, Hela, Generaider Boss of Doom, Jormungandr, Generaider Boss of Eternity, Utgarda, Generaider Boss of Delusion, Harr, Generaider Boss of Storms, Vala, Seidhr of the Generaider Bosses, Loptr, Shadow of the Generaider Bosses, Laevatein, and Generaider Boss of Shadows.
en.question:
If a Mirrorjade the Iceblade Dragon, which has the『you can only control 1 "Mirrorjade the Iceblade Dragon"』effect, is placed in my Spell & Trap Zone as an Equip Spell by my Relinquished's effect, can I Special Summon another Mirrorjade the Iceblade Dragon?

Furthermore, if Mirrorjade the Iceblade Dragon is instead placed in my Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Spell by Sinful Spoils of Subversion - Snake-Eye, can I Special Summon another Mirrorjade the Iceblade Dragon?
en.title: If a monster with the『you can only control 1 "⁜⁜⁜"』effect exists as an Equip Spell, or as a Continuous Spell, can a monster with the same name be Special Summoned?

ja.question:
『自分フィールドに１体しか表側表示で存在できない』効果を持つ「<<17069>>」が、「<<4737>>」の効果で装備魔法カードとして自分の魔法＆罠ゾーンに置かれている状況で、別の「<<17069>>」を特殊召喚できますか？

また、「<<17069>>」が「<<18847>>」の効果によって永続魔法カードとして自分の魔法＆罠ゾーンに存在する状況で、別の「<<17069>>」を特殊召喚できますか？
ja.title: 『１体しか表側表示で存在できない』モンスターが装備魔法カードや永続魔法カードとして存在する状況で、その同名モンスターを特殊召喚できますか？
